title: Login Problem
body:
It has been a while since i have played lol due to lack of pc. 
Now i got back,  and try to login server. But can not login the game, since it keeps saying wrong username and password. I am pretty sure about the password is correct since, i can login this site and can write this issue without problem.

replies.body:
[Start from scratch, uninstall and reinstall.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)

Let us know if you can login successfully afterwards. 

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/88/PVP.net_U_Alpha_Stage.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160308231936
Reinstalling league is not a likely solution in this case.  The problem may be with authenticating the account, which is verified through our servers and not local game files.

Being unable to login to an account might be due to being connected to the wrong region, or a change in your account.  I recommend checking out our [Account Recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to restore access to your account.  If you still have any issues logging in, let me know!
